name: Magical Screw Up
description:
-Submission to GMTKJam 2020-

You're an Apprentice Wizard who doesn't have control over their fiery magic... Using your ability for longer then you can handle will knock you unconscious and leave you for dead in the middle of the Magical Pine Forest...

You must do what you can to control your power, even if that means getting wet! Race through the forest in order to escape with your life...

Credits:

Music from https://freemusicarchive.org/

-Monplaisir - Level 2

-Rolemusic - The White

Some SFX from https://freesound.org/
